Package equipments.Lamp

Interface LampImplementationI

All Known Subinterfaces:
LampUserCI
All Known Implementing Classes:
Lamp, LampConnector, LampInboundPort, LampOutboundPort
public interface LampImplementationI
The interface LampImplementationI defines the signatures of services service implemented by the lamp component.

Description

Black-box Invariant 

 invariant      
 true
         // no invariant

Created on : 2023-10-10

Author:
Daniel SIMA, Walter ABELES
